== Kuttiattoor (CT) (627213) ==

Kuttiattoor (CT) is a town in the [[Taliparamba]] taluka of [[Kannur]] district with an area of 20.9 sq. km. and harbouring 3017 households with total population of 13244 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kannur]] is at a distance of 20 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 535 km. Male population is 6272 and female population is 6972. Scheduled Caste population is 681 and Scheduled Tribes population is 6. Census Location Code of the town is 627213<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kanhangad  (m + og) at a distance of 110 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 110 km. Railway station is at Kannur at a distance of 20 km.
